name: The Lost Prince (efrareal)
description:
<<< This is a indie-game Demo >>>

Lost Prince is an action-RPG Zelda-like, SNES-Like game, with stats like: STR, DEF, MTK,MDF, ACC, LCK and SPD

It is Quest-based game...

Follow this brave lady warrior into the quest of rescue the lost prince. 10 Years has passed since his disappearance, and nobody knows anything about it.

CONTROLS:

KeyBoard: WASD or directional arrows 

Mouse Left click to attack and select everything

Mouse Right click to interact with NPCs, Chest, etc

SpaceBar to change dialogues.
